content: SatoshiText.com: Create Your Online Store, and Sell Digital Productshttps://satoshitext.com/img/demo-store.pngSome of our advantages:    + Register your product with many delivery options.    + Sort your products into categories.    + Make a coupon code for your store.    + Dedicated contact form.    + Make a list of exclusive rules for your store.    + Create a list of frequently asked questions for your store.    + Keep track of customer feedback on your products and services.    + The flexibility to customize your shop.    + Multiple digital currency support.    + API DocumentationBegin Your Selling for Free :https://satoshitext.com/
